name: Video Voyeur #3: "Mr. Mom" Quiz | Music | 10 Questions

questions.text: Is Lonestar seen in this video?
questions.explanation:
No.

	The guys of Lonestar are not seen in this video as it is an animated video. However, the tour bus is seen in the final scene of the video.

questions.text: What was the last picture the oldest son took of his father?
options: Finding the baby in the dishwasher
Washing the baby in the bathtub
Taking a nap on the chair
questions.explanation:
Slipping on milk.

	The oldest son is seen throughout the video taking pictures of the dad while he is doing certain things. The last picture the son takes before their mom comes home is of his dad slipping on some milk on the floor.

questions.text: What is the dad doing when he sees the baby in Lonestar's tour bus?
questions.explanation:
Taking out the trash.

	After the song is over, the last scene is of the dad taking the trash out to the trash can. Lonestar's tour bus drives by him and sticking out the window is the baby.

questions.text: What is the first object the father pulls out of the baby's diaper?
questions.explanation:
Crayon.

	On the first diaper change, the father changed the baby's diaper without any problem. The second diaper change the baby had, the father pulled out a pink or red crayon.

questions.text: What was the baby trying to get out of the blender?
questions.explanation:
Toy truck.

	While the father was chasing his other two children around, the baby was trying to get his toy truck out of the blender. The blender was plugged up and the baby's feet were dangling close to the "on" button.

questions.text: Who is the first person to bring the baby back home after he disappears?
questions.explanation:
Elderly woman.

	After the father slips and falls, he realizes the baby is missing. When he answers the door, an elderly woman hands the baby to him. A scuba diver, biker, and clown also brought the baby home different times in the day.

questions.text: What is NOT one of the pictures the daughter is drawing on the wall throughout the day?
questions.explanation:
Moon.

	The daughter drew the word Lonestar and colored it in with purple. Around the band name was a picture of a shark, a sun, a star, an eagle, and a sailboat among other pictures.

questions.text: What book was the father reading while in the kitchen?
questions.explanation:
Cooking for Dummies.

	The father was trying to cook a recipe from "Cooking for Dummies", but the roast didn't match the picture. He also tried to make a cake, but he burnt it.

questions.text: When the father is dreaming of what it would be like to be a stay-at-home dad, what is his oldest son doing for him in the dream?
questions.explanation:
Fanning him.

	When the dad is dreaming about what it would be like to stay at home, his dream includes him sitting in the recliner while his daughter brings him lunch, the baby massages his feet, and the oldest son fans him.

questions.text: When the daughter is chasing the dog in the yard, what is the last animal seen buried in the backyard?
questions.explanation:
Fish.

	When the daughter is chasing the dog in the backyard, the tombstones of several animals are seen. From left to right, the buried animals are a bird, a fish, an armadillo, a parakeet, and another fish.
